message: I'm excited to sell you this great product! I'm looking for $150 for it.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm not able to pay that much. Would you be willing to go down to $100 for the product?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can do $130, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
Alice, $130 is still a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product.  Let me know if you're open to that.
I'm not willing to go as low as $110, Bob. I can meet you in the middle at $125, but that's as low as I can go.
